sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; function Dashboard() { return (

Ghost Identity Protection System

Secure your digital legacy and protect against posthumous identity misuse

Action Policies Create detailed policies for how your digital assets should be handled after death using natural language instructions. Trusted Contacts Designate trusted contacts who can verify death events and execute your digital legacy policies. System Administration Monitor system operations, view audit logs, and track AI-powered policy execution results. Digital Vault Register and manage your digital assets including email accounts, bank accounts, and social media profiles. How It Works
1. Register Assets

Add your digital accounts and assets to the secure vault

2. Set Policies

Define what should happen to each asset (delete, memorialize, etc.)

3. Add Contacts

Designate trusted contacts for death verification

4. AI Execution

Azure AI services automatically execute your policies when needed
); } export default Dashboard;
